channel.title: Ddd8 on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Ddd8 on Mark Needham

item.title: DDD8: Mixing functional and object oriented approaches to programming in C#
item.description: I did a presentation titled ‘Mixing functional and object oriented approaches to programming in C#’ at the Developer Developer Developer conference in Reading. The slides from the talk are below: Mixing functional and object oriented approaches to programming in C#View more presentations from markhneedham. I’ve not done many technical talks so far. My only previous attempt was a talk on F# one at the Sydney Alt.NET user group last year so I’m still learning how to do this effectively.
